name: HEROES TRIALS
description: An intense and fast-paced adventure broken into several trials that can also be played as a shooter. Help siblings Elia and Zoel to become their homeland heroes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Opengl 2.0 supported graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
